doc.field: - Net profit 305 mln francs vs 258 mln. Net dividend 25 francs vs 20 francs. Operating loss 696 mln francs vs 1.46 billion. Note - The company, which is the French subsidiary of Exxon Corp. [XON.N], said its net profit result included the reintegration of 1.2 billion francs of provisions for exchange fluctuations.
